.codebase-agent-container {\n      font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", Roboto, sans-serif;\n      border: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n      border-radius: 8px;\n      background: white;\n      padding: 16px;\n      margin: 12px 0;\n    }\n\n    .agent-input-section {\n      display: flex;\n      gap: 12px;\n      margin-bottom: 16px;\n    }\n\n    .agent-input {\n      flex: 1;\n      padding: 10px 14px;\n      font-size: 14px;\n      border: 1px solid #d1d5db;\n      border-radius: 6px;\n      outline: none;\n      transition: border-color 0.2s;\n    }\n\n    .agent-input:focus {\n      border-color: #10b981;\n      box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);\n    }\n\n    .agent-ask-button {\n      padding: 10px 20px;\n      font-size: 14px;\n      font-weight: 600;\n      background: #10b981;\n      color: white;\n      border: none;\n      border-radius: 6px;\n      cursor: pointer;\n      transition: all 0.2s;\n    }\n\n    .agent-ask-button:hover {\n      background: #059669;\n      transform: translateY(-1px);\n    }\n\n    .agent-ask-button:active {\n      transform: translateY(0);\n    }\n\n    .agent-section-label {\n      font-size: 12px;\n      font-weight: 700;\n      color: #6b7280;\n      text-transform: uppercase;\n      letter-spacing: 0.5px;\n      margin-bottom: 12px;\n      padding-bottom: 8px;\n      border-bottom: 2px solid #e8eaed;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-section,\n    .agent-response-section {\n      margin-top: 20px;\n      padding-top: 16px;\n      border-top: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-content {\n      font-size: 13px;\n      line-height: 1.6;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-item {\n      background: #f9fafb;\n      border-left: 3px solid #10b981;\n      padding: 12px;\n      margin-bottom: 12px;\n      border-radius: 4px;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-item-name {\n      font-weight: 600;\n      color: #10b981;\n      margin-bottom: 4px;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-item-path {\n      font-size: 11px;\n      color: #6b7280;\n      font-family: monospace;\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-item-doc {\n      color: #374151;\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-item-tags {\n      display: flex;\n      gap: 6px;\n      flex-wrap: wrap;\n    }\n\n    .agent-context-tag {\n      background: #e8eaed;\n      padding: 2px 8px;\n      border-radius: 12px;\n      font-size: 11px;\n      color: #4b5563;\n    }\n\n    .agent-response-content {\n      font-size: 14px;\n      line-height: 1.7;\n      color: #1f2937;\n    }\n\n    .agent-response-content h1,\n    .agent-response-content h2,\n    .agent-response-content h3 {\n      margin-top: 16px;\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n      color: #111827;\n    }\n\n    .agent-response-content code {\n      background: #f3f4f6;\n      padding: 2px 6px;\n      border-radius: 3px;\n      font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, monospace;\n      font-size: 13px;\n      color: #d73a49;\n    }\n\n    .agent-response-content pre {\n      background: #1e1e1e;\n      color: #d4d4d4;\n      padding: 16px;\n      border-radius: 6px;\n      overflow-x: auto;\n      margin: 12px 0;\n    }\n\n    .agent-response-content pre code {\n      background: none;\n      color: inherit;\n      padding: 0;\n    }\n\n    .agent-error {\n      color: #dc2626;\n      background: #fef2f2;\n      padding: 12px;\n      border-left: 3px solid #dc2626;\n      border-radius: 4px;\n    }\n    "' data-buffer-paths='[]'></marimo-anywidget></marimo-ui-element>
